pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, August 2, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Iqaluit, Nunavut  

8:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement regarding affordable housing and investments in Inuit communities.

Suputi Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to park and present themselves at the corner of Suputi Street and Atungauyait Drive by 8:15 a.m. 

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Ministerâ€™s Youth Council.              

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only
